ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Guilds vs. Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: Well for me, some benefits have been... I always have questions, my main is now a 28 enchanter.  I have some wonderful high level enchanters in my guild to
ygData.messageBody:
Well for me, some benefits have been...

I always have questions, my main is now a 28 enchanter.  I have some
wonderful high level enchanters in my guild to give me advice and answer my
neverending questions.  

I have guildmates who are willing to help anyone who needs it.  If I can't
find something I need, perhaps they have it and I can either buy it at cost
or they will just give it.  

People share their skills at cost to guildmates in my guild.

Great raids.  We can set up raids and get good loot and experience.  

Then of course is the social aspect.  There's always someone you can joke
around with or complain to if you're a chatty sort.  

Off the top of my head, there's just a few.  

Lena


I have seen a lot of people with guild names on my server and I was really
wondering what the benefit of being in a guild would be to going it without
one???

I mean I can always find someone to group with... or solo it on the blue's
and blacks....

Other then maybe another aspect added to the role playing game what benefit
do you recieve from a Guild.

ok got to run just wondering
